details.title: Optical wireless interface for the ARINC 429 avionics bus: Design and implementation
details.abstract: A complete optical wireless interface for the ARINC 429 avionics bus has been presented as part of this paper. After evaluating the previous results, we conclude that the described system complies with all electrical and timing restrictions imposed by the ARINC 429 specification, ensuring the compatibility with such avionics bus.
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
